scripts.build: npm run webui-build && npm run lambda-build && npm run cfn-build
scripts.cfn-build: npm run cfn-package && npm run lambda-inline
scripts.cfn-package: npm run cfn-ensure-dist && cfn-flip -c -n -l src/cfn/template.yaml templates/template.yaml
scripts.deploy: npm run webui-deploy && npm run cfn-deploy
scripts.postinstall: cd src/web-ui && npm i && cd ../functions/setup && npm i
scripts.webui-deploy: cd src/web-ui/build && aws s3 cp . s3://rekognition-engagement-meter/static --recursive --acl public-read --exclude settings.js --exclude .DS_Store
